title: so many problems dont know where to start (day 6 no league)
body: everytime i click launch on my normal launcher bugsplat. my pbe launcher will launch let me log in and then loses contact with maestro in less then a min. ive ran hextech repair tool multiple times ive uninstalled and reinstalled twice ive tried every piece of advice i have gotten from friends players and riot support. im just at a loss. ive tried running as admin. i feel like ive tried everything.

replies.body:
It looks like you're already working with one of our tech specialists on this in a support ticket. I recommend you continue to work with your specialists on this so this can get resolved.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
This has started for me today. Can't play it. At. All.
if u find a good solution let me know. its been like this for 6days for me and i want to play so bad
